words.definition: a place to live or stay in for a while.
a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service
something that you want to do or achieve very much
determined to be successful, rich, powerful, etc.
a person who studies the human race, especially its origins, development, customs and beliefs
a person who makes a formal request for something (= applies for it), especially for a job, a place at a college or university, etc.
to make a formal request, usually in writing, for something such as a job, a loan, permission for something, a place at a university, etc.
a particular part or feature of a situation, an idea, problem, etc.; a way in which it may be considered
manager who assists another manager
to be present at an event
the way that you think and feel about somebody/something; the way that you behave towards somebody/something that shows how you think and feel
a prize such as money, etc. for something that somebody has done
the way that somebody behaves, especially towards other people
to think or say that somebody/something is responsible for something bad
a person who writes a blog
a part of something larger
full of light; shining strongly
always cheerful, friendly and enthusiastic
a person, team, etc. that has won a competition, especially in a sport
to go up something towards the top
to give all your attention to something and not think about anything else
involving the use of skill and the imagination to produce something new or a work of art
to say that you think somebody/something is bad; to say what you do not like or think is wrong about somebody/something
the work of looking after customers and ensuring their satisfaction with one's business and its goods or services
a person who makes decisions
if you are determined to do something, you have made a firm decision to do it and will not let anything stop you.
in some organisations and public authorities, the person in charge is referred to as the director.
disagreement means objecting to something such as a proposal.
dragonflies are brightly-coloured insects with long, thin bodies and two sets of wings. Dragonflies are often found near slow-moving water.
before the usual time that a particular event or activity happens.
Entertainment consists of performances of plays and films, and activities such as reading and watching television, that give people pleasure.
The entrance to a place is the way into it, for example a door or gate.
concerned with the protection of the natural world of land, sea, air, plants, and animals.
An executive is someone who is employed by a business at a senior level. Executives decide what the business should do, and ensure that it is done.
becoming, or capable of becoming, greater in extent, volume, size, or scope
Failure is a lack of success in doing or achieving something, especially in relation to a particular activity.
If you achieve fame, you become very well-known.
A flock of birds, sheep, or goats is a group of them.
to achieve the highest point
a person always achieving high results
If a person or society has humanitarian ideas or behaviour, they try to avoid making people suffer or they help people who are suffering.
new and original.
Job satisfaction is the pleasure that you get from doing your job.
The living conditions, behaviour, and habits that are typical of them or are chosen by them.
A lifetime is the length of time that someone is alive.
have increasing good results
to fire thinking someone is extra employee and not needed
the activity of running and controlling a business or similar organisation
to be the reason why somebody does something or behaves in a particular way
a system of trying to meet and talk to other people who may be useful to you in your work
to do what you are told or expected to do
a job or profession
community formed online
during or for the night
the regular way in which something happens or is done
the particular attitude or opinion that somebody has about something
the place where somebody/something is located
a way of doing something, especially the usual or correct way
a person, a company or a country that grows or makes food, goods or materials
the possibility that something will happen
the standard of something when it is compared to other things like it; how good or bad something is
to leave your job, school, etc.
changing office
not for a rent
the opinion that people have about what somebody/something is like, based on what has happened in the past
a person who studies something carefully and tries to discover new facts about it
to learn, or to teach somebody, a new type of work, a new skill, etc.
a statement of what may, must or must not be done in a particular situation or when playing a game
a certificate you get when leaving school
payment you get from work when you are sick or taking a holiday
having enough ability, experience and knowledge to be able to do something well
a person who is an expert in a particular area of work or study
the amount of money and level of comfort that a particular person or group has
to continue to be in a particular place for a period of time without moving away
right or appropriate for somebody/something
to be in charge of somebody/something and to make sure that everything is done correctly, safely, etc.
to do something even though you know that something bad could happen as a result
having a natural ability to do something well
a person leading a team, having leadership skills
lasting or intended to last or be used only for a short time; not permanent
quiet, because you are thinking
to travel to past
to have or keep something that you love and that is extremely valuable to you
used to emphasise how good, bad or extreme something is
to join together with other people in order to do something as a group
not having or needing special skills or training
till the present time
how much something is worth
a stamp or mark put in your passport by officials of a foreign country that gives you permission to enter, pass through, or leave their country.
known about by a lot of people
to think about something and try to decide what is true, what will happen, what you should do, etc.
the quality of conditions provided for working
the working time in a week
a list of aims or possible future achievements
something that you hope to achieve
a special power which makes people have naturally which makes them able to influence other people and attract their attention and admiration
when you are willing to give your time and energy to something that you believe in, or a promise or firm decision to do something
when someone conquers a country, area or situation
a set of pleasant thoughts about something you would prefer to be doing or something you would like to achieve in the future
when someone believes something that is not true
the ability to continue trying to do something, although it is very difficult
wanting very much to do or have something, especially something interesting or enjoyable
a preference or tendency or a feeling that makes a person want to do something
something or someone that you think about all the time
the ability to control your own thoughts and the way in which you behave; determination
